Give names to the dots and list the properties described.

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x,y,z in permutations(config):
            check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
            check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
            check_y_large = is_large(y, ctx)
            check_y_lightest = y == lightest([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_y_above_x = is_above(y, x, ctx)
            check_z_small = is_small(z, ctx)
            check_z_grey = is_grey(z, ctx)
            check_z_right_x = is_right(z, x, ctx)
            if (
                check_xyz_close
                and check_x_large
                and check_x_dark
                and check_y_large
                and check_y_lightest
                and check_y_above_x
                and check_z_small
                and check_z_grey
                and check_z_right_x
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y,z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 2):
        for x,y in permutations(config):
            check_xy_close = get_distance(x, y, ctx) == 1
            check_xy_identical = same_color([x,y], ctx) and same_size([x,y], ctx)
            check_x_light = is_light(x, ctx)
            check_y_light = is_light(y, ctx)
            check_x_medium_large = is_medium_size(x, ctx)
            check_y_medium_large = is_medium_size(y, ctx)
            check_y_below_right_x = is_below(y, x, ctx) and is_right(y, x, ctx)
            if (
                check_xy_close
                and check_xy_identical
                and check_x_light
                and check_y_light
                and check_x_medium_large
                and check_y_medium_large
                and check_y_below_right_x
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
